rows.label: qev092004_MSG0080
rows.name:
Let her help out even though it's not her division?
Let her help just because she's responsible?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0081
rows.name: Hmph! Sugary sweet as always, Alexa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0001
rows.name: Mika?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0002
rows.name: Oh. Alexa. What are you doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0003
rows.name: What are YOU doing here, Mika?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0004
rows.name: Uhm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0005
rows.name: "Uhm"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0006
rows.name: ...Yyyeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0007
rows.name: ..."Yyyeah"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0008
rows.name: I hear another prototype blew up on you. You okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0009
rows.name: Right as rain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0011
rows.name: Oh my gosh. It was...you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0012
rows.name: ...I'm sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0013
rows.name: I planned to do it when I was sure no one would get hurt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0014
rows.name: But then time was short and I just...panicked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0015
rows.name: Why did you do it, Mika?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0016
rows.name: Because I hate you, okay? I HATE you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0017
rows.name:
Look, if this is about Camber's Skell,
I'm trying to make it up to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0018
rows.name: I'll do whatever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0019
rows.name: THAT'S why I hate you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0020
rows.name: I've been Camber's friend since back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0021
rows.name:
But then we get here, and within two months
you've got him wrapped around your finger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0022
rows.name: I know this is totally bitter and I should have made a move...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0023
rows.name:
But you just walked in with your hair and
your attitude and WENT FOR IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0024
rows.name: Oh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0025
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0028
rows.name: Help me out here. Why is she mad at me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev092004_SEL0011
rows.name:
Say that Mika thinks Alexa is
trying to steal the man she loves.

rows.label: qev092004_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092004_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Alexa if she really doesn't understand.

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0029
rows.name: Ohhh, got it! Got it, got it, got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0030
rows.name: Wow, you are really not smart, Mika.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0031
rows.name: Don't lie to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0032
rows.name: You come waltzing by almost every day to chat up Camber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0033
rows.name: And he just eats it up, the fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0034
rows.name:
Then you charge off to get
spare Skell parts so he'll like you more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0035
rows.name: Just to show how sweet and dedicated you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0036
rows.name: Don't tell me that's just a coincidence![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0037
rows.name: Oh, come on. That's stupid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0038
rows.name: It is NOT stupid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0039
rows.name: Uh, yeah. I'm totally lost here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0040
rows.name: Oh, come on. No one is this stupid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0041
rows.name: You come waltzing by almost every day to chat up Camber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0042
rows.name: And he just eats it up, the fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0043
rows.name:
Then you charge off to get spare
Skell parts so he'll like you more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0044
rows.name: Just to show how sweet and dedicated you are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0045
rows.name: You love Camber! Admit it, homewrecker![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0046
rows.name: Ohmigosh. THAT'S what this is about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0047
rows.name: Ha! So you admit it, then![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0048
rows.name: No![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0049
rows.name: I don't love Camber—I love his SKELL![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0050
rows.name: The reason I visit you guys all the time is to look at your gear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0051
rows.name:
And I only wanted to get those parts because
the idea of a wrecked Skell makes me totally sad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0052
rows.name: You've got to be kidding me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0053
rows.name: Honestly! The only love in my life is giant robots.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0054
rows.name: C'mon, help me out here. This lady is crackers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_JNK0030
rows.name: Censure

rows.label: qev092004_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Mika that this is all her fault.

rows.label: qev092004_JNK0040
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092004_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that Alexa is right—Skells
are more important than love.

rows.label: qev092004_JNK0050
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev092004_SEL0051
rows.name:
Say that a woman who is nuts about Skells
should not be calling anyone crackers.

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0055
rows.name: I...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0056
rows.name: This is really all in my head?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0057
rows.name: Yup.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0058
rows.name:
Oh wow. I'm sorry. To both of you.
I made a huge mess of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0059
rows.name: Ah, don't worry about it. No one got hurt, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0060
rows.name: It doesn't matter. I've been a fool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0061
rows.name: Yes! Somebody else finally gets it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0062
rows.name: I honestly think I could live forever in a Skell's arms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0063
rows.name: Until it crushed you to death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0064
rows.name:
Anyway, you've both made it clear
you're freakishly obsessed with Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0065
rows.name: Meanwhile, I've made it clear that I'm a stupid, jealous idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0066
rows.name: I'm really sorry, Alexa. Forgive me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0067
rows.name: Aw, low blow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0068
rows.name: It's not a creepy love or anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0069
rows.name:
And it's not like I've gone all psycho jealous
and started planting bombs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0070
rows.name: Frankly, a little Skell love seems normal in comparison.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0071
rows.name: Yikes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0072
rows.name:
Anyway, you've both made it clear
you're freakishly obsessed with Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0073
rows.name: And I've made it clear that I'm a stupid, jealous idiot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0074
rows.name: I'm really sorry, Alexa. Forgive me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0075
rows.name:
I'll forgive you IF you promise to let me
take your Skell for a spin sometime![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0076
rows.name: That's all you want?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0077
rows.name: All? That's HUGE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0078
rows.name: You've got yourself a deal. Just...don't break it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092004_MSG0079
rows.name: Yay! You got it.[ST:wait ]
